LanguageData.VGE_OxygenLeak.letterText: While landing {GRAVSHIP}, a small breach opened in one of the oxygen tanks, venting the entirety of the tank's supply. Until the leak is repaired, the oxygen tank will not work.
LanguageData.VGE_VacBarrierFlicker.letterText: While landing {GRAVSHIP}, a power fluctuation caused one of the vac barriers to fail, depressurizing a small section of the ship. It will need to be repaired for it to work again.
LanguageData.VGE_GravdataCorruption.letterText: An unexpected electromagnetic spike during landing corrupted all of the gravdata collected on this trip.
LanguageData.VGE_AstrofuelPipeRupture.letterText: During {GRAVSHIP}'s landing, a damaged fuel line sprayed astrofuel into the room. A stray spark set it ablaze in a sudden astrofire.
LanguageData.VGE_UnwantedAttention.letterText: As {GRAVSHIP} descended, its heat signature was spotted by nearby raiders. They've rallied and are moving in to attack before the dust settles.
LanguageData.VGE_VerminInfestation.letterText: Shortly after {GRAVSHIP} touched down, swarms of manhunting rats poured out of ventilation shafts across the ship. No one knows how they got in.
LanguageData.VGE_CriticalHeatSpike.letterText: While bringing {GRAVSHIP} down, the grav engine's heat control system malfunctioned, causing structural heat to surge far beyond safe limits.
LanguageData.VGE_GravTurbulence.letterText: An unexpected gravitic vibration during {GRAVSHIP}’s descent shook every component on board, loosening bolts and wearing joints.
